page.title: 11GOVERNMENT
page.content: Biggar is part of {Clydesdale {District},which in its turn is part of {Strathclyde Region}.At a purely local level Biggar's interests are looked after by is local councillor Esme Hamilton,who is an Independant. Local matters are also discussed by Biggar{ {Community Council.} However the { {Community Council }is currently facing a crisis due to lack of funds. The Community has an integrated bus and rail link to Glasgow provided by Strathclyde Region. Central Government through the G.P.O provide a Post Bus service to some of the neighbouring villages.Apart from Transport the Region plays a major part in deciding Educational Policy and this became a major local issue over wether pupils should be bussed to other schools for some subjects. { }
